reviews.review: I dont think that there is such thing of a game being a masterpiece, but this is pretty close to a masterpiece. there is just something about it, i dont what it is but its so fun, and the rich story, but you need to play the first game to understand whats happening, its also aged very well. 9.9/10
Pretty sure if i down thumb this Valve will kill me in my sleep with a crowbar.
VIVA LA LIBERTAD !! SOMOS HOMBRES LIBRES !! SOMOS FREEMAN !!
For sure one the best masterpieces ever created.

Half-life 2, uno de los shooters que definieron un antes y despues, igual que su antecesor.
Es un juego que lo recomiendo muchisimo, igual que la primera entrega.
Recomendado 100%.
Es Half-Life 2. Uno de los mejores juegos jamas echos. Si nunca lo jugaste te estas perdiendo de una verdadera joya.
Um cl√°ssico! Vale a pena demais!

was probably good for its time but its aged badly. ladders are annoying, enemies walk right into your shots, hard to navigate, and gets old quickly. each gimmick like the cars, squads etc arae used like an hour each and it gets pretty boring. its okay but i would wait for it to go on sale before buying
i am wanted for 500 counts of murder
jogo foda historia legal so falta o 3

[h1] ENG [/h1]
[list]
[*] The time has come Dr. Freeman ... the time has come ... [/list]
The words of G-Man at the very beginning of our journey ... it is nostalgia.
After a long wait, we are called to another case. The new City-17 is the last hope of humanity in the custody of the Alliance.
The fanatic Wallace Brin, also known as the former Administrator of the Black Mesa, took full control of the city.

After the destruction of Nihilant, the era of experiments and borrowing technology from the world of ZEN began.
We quickly grasp all this beauty, because a lot of time has passed since the incident. The world has become more spacious, although it is almost empty, Arsenal is smaller for me, the costume of the new version is more practical and mobile, a good plot, characters.
Sound - unfortunately only in Russian.

It also seemed to me that the game is short, as if there is a lot of space, but in fact it's just an illusion.

In general, the game is not bad, a great continuation of the story of Gordon Freeman.
The engine is of course an old kid, but it looks tolerable, although against the background of the remake of Black Mesa, it looks weak, but there is now a sea of ‚Äã‚Äãmods on the Internet to help.
I definitely recommend going through the sequel and episodes 1 and 2.
Respect to all the fans and Valve himself for the first and most favorite game of my childhood.
amazing story telling and gameplay would recommend

A really good game for speedrunners. Replayable, good mechanics, very fluid and smooth gameplay. Don't have to say much kore honestly

For a game that was groundbreaking for its time. Half-Life 2 still holds up almost 18 years since it was first released and is still considered by many to be ‚Äúone of the best video games of all time‚Äù.

The story carries over from the end of the first Half-Life game but there are many retcons (mainly to do with the names of unknown characters that appear in the first game.) But this time, Gordon Freeman is travelling to a place called City 17 where he‚Äôs up a tyrannical force.
